summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust for the period of April 1, 2018, to April 30, 2018. It includes information on deposits, service charges, and interest earned, as well as instructions for addressing errors in the statement.

persons.name: Siouan Oldfield
persons.context: Siouan Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details the account balance of the Butterfly Trust as of April 30, 2018.
The beginning balance on April 1, 2018, was $733,265.10.
There were no service charges or fees during the statement period.
Interest earned during the period was $267.09.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in the account statement.
